title: Gormathon - Following The Beast (Limited Edition)   2014
description:
Gormathon - Following The Beast mp3  2014...............	Melodic death metal from Sweden, latest full-length album released in 2014.





Gormathon is a Swedish Metal-band, formed in 2009 by Tony Sunnhag (vocals & bass), Stefan Jonsson (guitar) and Tony Sandberg (drums). Later Thomas Hedlund (bass) and Peter Sonefors (guitar) joined to the band. 2010 the band landed a record deal with the Swedish label Supernova Records and their debut album "Lens of Guardian" was released the same year.

In autumn 2010 Kalle SvedÃƒÂ¥ker replaced Thomas Hedlund on bass. 2012 Markus Albertson (ex-Tad Morose, ex-Bloodbound) replaced Peter Sonefors as a guitarist in the band. Spring 2012 Gormathon released a new single and a music video "Land Of The Lost".
